title: Ticket #746: ABORT_ON_EXCEPTION=TRUE: follow SIGABRT with SIGKILL
description: If a child daemon hangs when handling the ABRT sent by its parent, such as the master killing a hung startd, the child will never exit. The parent needs to escalate the signal to KILL after a period where the child is allowed to ABRT.
